title: Occurrence of the y-intercept
text: The $$y$$ intercept occurs when the input is zero
speech: The  y  intercept occurs when the input is zero
pacedSpeech: intercept occurs when the input is zero

title: Occurrence of the x-intercept
text: The x-intercept occurs when the output is zero.
speech: The x-intercept occurs when the output is zero.
pacedSpeech: The x-intercept occurs when the output is zero.

title: Factoring the Polynomial to Determine Zeros
text: To determine when the output is zero, we will need to factor the polynomial
speech: To determine when the output is zero, we will need to factor the polynomial
pacedSpeech: To determine when the output is zero, we will need to factor the polynomial
